detailed_results.prompt: show me guidance sources you used in your answer
detailed_results.answer:
UK higher education admissions are primarily managed through the Universities and Colleges Admissions Service (UCAS), where prospective students apply directly to universities. Universities then assess applications based on academic qualifications, personal statements, and references, and may also require interviews or admissions tests for certain courses. **Sources Used:**
**UCAS Website:** Provides comprehensive information on the application process, entry requirements, and university choices ([https://www.ucas.com/](https://www.ucas.com/))
_This answer isn't grounded to your knowledge base; refine or ask to search._.
